question: Before appointment as the Viceroy of India, Lord Willingdon served as the Governor of which of the following places of India?
explanation: From the year 1913 to 1917, Lord Willingdon served as the Governor of Bombay and in the year 1919 (10th April) he was appointed as the Governor of Madras. Lord Willingdon served as the Viceroy of India from 1931 to 1936.
